hero.title: SonoNetwork
hero.description: Join the adventure in our amazing Minecraft world!

features.gameplayDesc: Experience thrilling adventures and creative building.
features.communityDesc: Join a welcoming community of Minecraft enthusiasts.
features.performanceDesc: Enjoy smooth gameplay with our optimized server infrastructure.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are passionate Minecraft players dedicated to creating the best server experience for our community.
about.history2020: Opened a Aternos server for friends.
about.history2021: We buyed a server at G-Portal
about.history2022: Nico founder of MC Friens got the idea to open a Minecraft server.
about.history2024: We named our server into SonoNetwork.
about.missionDesc: To provide a fun, safe, and creative environment for Minecraft players from all around the world.

gamemodes.title: Our Gamemodes
gamemodes.survivalDesc: Classic Minecraft survival experience with a few twists.
